org.jboss.aerogear.security.model

Class AeroGearUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.aerogear.security.model.AeroGearUser

  • public class AeroGearUser
extends Object
    A simple POJO User entity to support the most widely-used authentication mechanism

      • getUri

        public String getUri()
        URI retrieval
        Returns:
        OTP URI encoded in QRCode. For example: otpauth://totp/alice@google.com?secret=JBSWY3DPEHPK3PXP
